attributes.review: This is the most poorly designed app I have ever had on my phone. Every time I tried to open it, it glitched out and closed the app. When I finally got onto the app everything was pixelated and you could see the app code. The images on the screen seemed to form the shape of a white hood but I couldnâ€™t really tell. The next day, nothing on my phone was working and I found out I had a virus, which I was able to trace back and it CAME FROM THE TRUMP APP. I had to completely reset my phone and lost all of my data. Seriously, the worst thing Iâ€™ve ever downloaded. I would give it zero stars if I could.
